verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> in the <S%H2022>hill<s%> <S%H2022>country<s%> and in the <S%H8219>lowland<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2348>coast<s%> of the <S%H1419>Great<s%> <S%H3220>Sea<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H3844>Lebanon,<s%> the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> and the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite,<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> of it,
that they <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves <S%H9191>together<s%> with <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6310>accord<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and with <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
When the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> and to <S%H5857>Ai,<s%>

they <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6213>acted<s%> <S%H6195>craftily<s%> and <S%H1980>set<s%> out as <S%H6737>envoys,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> worn-out <S%H8242>sacks<s%> on their <S%H2543>donkeys,<s%> and <S%H4997>wineskins,<s%> worn-out and <S%H1234>torn<s%> and <S%H9503>mended,<s%>

and worn-out and <S%H2921>patched<s%> <S%H5275>sandals<s%> on their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and worn-out <S%H8008>clothes<s%> on themselves; and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of their <S%H9479>provision<s%> was <S%H3001>dry<s%> [and] had <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5350>crumbled.<s%>

And they <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> to the <S%H4264>camp<s%> at <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him and to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> "We have <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> therefore, <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us."

And the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H2340>Hivites,<s%> <S%H194>"Perhaps<s%> you are <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> our <S%H7130>land;<s%> <S%H349>how<s%> then shall we <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you?"

But they <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> "We are your <S%H5650>servants.<s%>" Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4310>"Who<s%> are you, and <S%H370>where<s%> do you <S%H935>come<s%> from?"

And they <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Your <S%H5650>servants<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%> because of the <S%H8034>fame<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> for we have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8089>report<s%> of Him and <S%H3605>all<s%> that He <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> that He <S%H6213>did<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorites<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> to <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> and to <S%H5747>Og<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was at <S%H6252>Ashtaroth.<s%>

"So our <S%H2205>elders<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of our <S%H776>country<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3947>'Take<s%> <S%H6720>provisions<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> for the <S%H1870>journey,<s%> and <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H7122>meet<s%> them and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, "We are your <S%H5650>servants;<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> then, <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with us."'

<S%H2088>"This<s%> our <S%H3899>bread<s%> [was] <S%H2525>warm<s%> [when] we <S%H9480>took<s%> it for our <S%H9480>provisions<s%> out of our <S%H1004>houses<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> that we <S%H3318>left<s%> to <S%H1980>come<s%> to you; but <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is <S%H3001>dry<s%> and has <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H5350>crumbled.<s%>

"And <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4997>wineskins<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H4390>filled<s%> were <S%H2319>new,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they are <S%H1234>torn;<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> our <S%H8008>clothes<s%> and our <S%H5275>sandals<s%> are <S%H1086>worn<s%> out <S%H4480>because<s%> of the <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7231>long<s%> <S%H1870>journey.<s%>"
So the <S%H376>men<s%> [of Israel] <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of their <S%H9479>provisions,<s%> and did not <S%H7592>ask<s%> for the <S%H6310>counsel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> with them and <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them, to let them <S%H2421>live;<s%> and the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> [an oath] to them.

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> they had <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them, that they <S%H8085>heard<s%> that they were <S%H7138>neighbors<s%> and that they were <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> their <S%H7130>land.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> out and <S%H935>came<s%> to their <S%H5892>cities<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> Now their <S%H5892>cities<s%> [were] <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> and <S%H3716>Chephirah<s%> and <S%H881>Beeroth<s%> and Kiriath-jearim.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did not <S%H5221>strike<s%> them <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> had <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to them by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H9235>grumbled<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders.<s%>

But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> "We have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to them by the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> we <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5060>touch<s%> them.

<S%H2088>"This<s%> we will <S%H6213>do<s%> to them, even let them <S%H2421>live,<s%> <S%H3808>lest<s%> <S%H7110>wrath<s%> be upon us for the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> we <S%H7650>swore<s%> to them."

And the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Let them <S%H2421>live.<s%>" So they <S%H1961>became<s%> <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H2404>wood<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H5387>leaders<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to them.

Then <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for them and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>"Why<s%> have you <S%H7411>deceived<s%> us, <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'We are <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7350>far<s%> from you,' when you are <S%H3427>living<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> our <S%H7130>land<s%>?

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, you are <S%H779>cursed,<s%> and you shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3772>cease<s%> being <S%H5650>slaves,<s%> both <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H2404>wood<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H430>God.<s%>"

So they <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3588>"Because<s%> it was <S%H5046>certainly<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> your <S%H5650>servants<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> His <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>land,<s%> and to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you; therefore we <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H3966>greatly<s%> for our <S%H5315>lives<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of you, and have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>thing.<s%>

"And <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> we are in your <S%H3027>hands;<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> as it seems <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> to us."
<S%H3651>Thus<s%> he <S%H6213>did<s%> to them, and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> them from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they did not <S%H2026>kill<s%> them.

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H5414>made<s%> them that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2404>hewers<s%> of <S%H2404>wood<s%> and <S%H7579>drawers<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He would <S%H977>choose.<s%>
